item.title: My Unconventional Way to Become an Embedded Software Engineer

item.title: About Me
item.author: aarzho@gmail.com (Aaron Zhou)
item.description: Hi There! Nice to meet you! Allow me to introduce myself a little bit. My name is Aaron Zhou. I’m a seasoned embedded software engineer living in San Francisco Bay Area. I have a full time job at a startup. In my spare time I like to contribute to open source software and blog. I have a Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering with a focus on Embedded Control. I’m also the senior member of Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).
